mapper.sql: pd_id, pmc_id, drug_id, pd_amount, pd_state, isva, optime, oper, sort
pd.pd_id, dd.drug_id, dp.pmc_name, dd.drug_name, pd.pd_amount, dd.drug_unit, dd.drug_prop
mapper.select:
select count(pd.pd_id) from drug_pmc_details pd,drug_pmc dp,drug_drug dd where pd.pmc_id = dp.pmc_id and pd.drug_id = dd.drug_id
and pd.pmc_id = #{pmcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and pd.pmc_name like CONCAT('%',#{pmcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dd.drug_name like CONCAT('%',#{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-','') AS id;
insert into drug_pmc_details
pd_id,
pmc_id,
drug_id,
pd_amount,
pd_state,
isva,
optime,
oper,
sort,

#{drugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update drug_pmc_details
pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pd_amount = #{pdAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pd_state = #{pdState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pd_id = #{pdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update drug_pmc_details set pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pd_amount = #{pdAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pd_state = #{pdState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pd_id = #{pdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
